title: Poetic Infinity: Passion and Promise
description: Poetry has the unique ability to find the heart and soul of people and soothe it. This book is full of passionate poetry that provides the promise of serenity and joy. Poetic Infinity has it eye-openers, love, conflicting interests and spirituality. The poems have momentum all their own. They will suck you like a vortex of fantasy!
author: Lacresha Hayes
